content.html: I don't want this site to implode! I have built up a network of people I love to read and followers who are supportive and engaged. I will miss that. If you want to get to know more women techies, there are a few on this list: twitter.com/i/lists/712989â€¦ I hope to stay in touch
content.value:
I don't want this site to implode! I have built up a network of people I love to read and followers who are supportive and engaged. I will miss that.

If you want to get to know more women techies, there are a few on this list: twitter.com/i/lists/712989â€¦ 

I hope to stay in touch
